name: rinsing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
rinse
rinse verb [I or T]
(CLEAN)
to use water to clean the soap or dirt from something: First apply shampoo to hair and then rinse thoroughly. There was no soap, so I just rinsed my hands with water.
